document_data.name: Cove of the Queen
document_data.mainbody: The '''Cove of the Queen''' was a hidden pirate harbor-temple of [[Umberlee]] on the island of [[Mintarn]] in the [[Sea of Swords]].
document_data.Location: The Cove of the Queen was a harbor hidden from unknowing casual eye. The temple was used exclusively by the pirates of the region and they served the Wavemistress Royal, the high priestess of the temple.
document_data.History: The leader of the Umberlant devotees ''circa'' [[1369 DR]] was [[Qalbess Frostyl]].
